Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class ClientChatReceivedEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ClientChatReceivedEvent
public class ClientChatReceivedEvent extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
Fired on the client when a chat message is received.
If this event is cancelled, the message is not displayed in the chat message window.
Fired on MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS.

    • getSenderUUID

      @Nullable public UUID getSenderUUID()
      The UUID of the player or entity that sent this message, or null if not known. This will be equal to Util.NIL_UUID for system messages.
